cause.description:
Rajinikanth (Tamil: ரஜினிகாந்த்; Marathi: रजनीकांत; Telugu:రజనికాంత్; Kannada: ರಜನೀಕಾಂತ್) (born Shivaji Rao Gaekwad on December 12, 1950) is a popular actor in the Indian film industry. As an experienced actor and a national celebrity, he received India's third highest civilian honour, the Padmabhushan for his work in Indian cinema in 2000.[2] Rajinikanth performs predominantly in leading roles ranging from comedies, drama, action and thrillers.
1. Superstar Rajni for Indian President!
cause.mission: Pay tribute to tamil nadu's finest - Rajnikanth
cause.name: Superstar Rajni Appreciation
